lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson sparked a verbal spat with former United States captain Hal Sutton at Hazeltine on Wednesday for events that occurred during the 2004 Ryder Cup at Oakland Hills.

headline.print_headline: Mickelson Starts War of Words With Former Cup Captain Sutton
headline.main: Mickelson Starts War of Words With Former Cup Captain Sutton

snippet: Phil Mickelson sparked a verbal spat with former United States captain Hal Sutton at Hazeltine on Wednesday for events that occurred during the 2004 Ryder Cup at Oakland Hills....
